items.title: Share Market Today: Sebi Bd meet outcome, Israel War, Powell on rate cuts
items.description: At 7:20 AM, GIFT Nifty futures were trading approximately 8 points higher at 25,998 against Nifty futures close, suggesting a muted opening.

items.title: Stocks To Watch: Airtel, Blue Dart, Indian Oil, Bajaj Auto, Tata Power
items.description: Stocks to watch today: Blue Dart Express announced a price increase of 9-12 per cent for shipments starting January 1, 2025.

items.title: Nifty Bank, Fin Svcs nearing correction; should you accumulate the dips?
items.description: The Nifty Bank Index is currently trading at 52,989.70, and the near-term trend appears to be down. However, this correction should be viewed as a healthy pullback within an overall bullish structure

items.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: Sensex, Nifty likely to open higher, signals GIFT Nifty; Blue Dart eyed
items.description: Stock Market Today: GIFT Nifty futures were trading marginally ahead at 26,014 at 7:35 AM, indicating marginal gains at open in India.

items.title: Asian stocks ease, dollar strengthens as traders weigh US interest rates
items.description: Oil prices were steady and gold traded just below a record high touched last week as investors awaited US labour data

items.title: Diffusion Engineers IPO allotment: Check status, GMP, likely listing price
items.description: Once the Diffusion Engineers IPO allotment is finalised, investors can check their status visiting the official websites of BSE, NSE, or Bigshare Services

items.title: Stock Market Holiday: BSE, NSE to remain closed on October 2; key updates
items.description: Stock Market October Holiday: Is the Indian stock market closed tomorrow? Will NSE, BSE be open for trading? All you need to know about stock market holidays in October

items.title: Nifty, Bank Nifty PCR turns bearish; Longs added in MidCap; Shorts in RIL
items.description: Derivatives market update Oct 01: FIIs continue to hold more than 4 long positions in index futures for every short bet. Proprietary trades hold 5 shorts for every bullish bet in index futures.
